attributes.action: Increase the availability of termination clinics in the north east
attributes.additional_details:
Currently, people living in the north east of the UK may have to travel over 65 miles each way to reach a safe and legal abortion clinic, not only costing thousands of vulnerable women their time, but also a huge amount of money.

There are many reasons why a woman might decide to have an abortion including:

personal circumstances - including risk to the wellbeing of existing children
a health risk to the mother
a high probability that the baby will have a serious abnormality - either genetic or physical

Why hinder a women's ability to access SAFE and LEGAL unplanned pregnancy services because of where she lives? There need to be more clinics open between Hull - Leeds. Please sign.
